org.sandag.popsyn.domain
Class Person

java.lang.Object
  org.sandag.popsyn.domain.Person
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPerson
public class Person
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPerson

This class represents individual persons in PopSyn. Each Person object is mapped to a PUMS record in the database. As with for the Household class, this mapping is carried out by ReaderDao and Household.xml

Field Summary
protected  int age
          An integer that corresponds to the person's age
protected  boolean hispanic
          The person's hispanic status in terms of a boolean where true indicates hispanic
protected  double initWeight
          The initial PUMS sample weight of the person
protected  boolean male
          The person's gender in terms of a boolean where true indicates male
protected  RaceType race
          The person's race
